TopicTitle: Where are Bill Jeb an Bob?

Articles.Content:
Hey, I downloaded the 0.15 update immediately and loved every bit of it, but after several trips to minmus, I noticed that something wasn\'t right. In 0.14, Bill Jeb and Bob seemed to be the default team, The first in line if they were not already away. But even though I had not sent any missions, Bill Jeb and Bob were nowhere to be seen

Where are they?, anyone else find this too?
Maybe they\'re finally dead after dying so many times.
Yep, that can happen. Mine currently seem to be perma-KIA also. If you really want em back you can delete your persistence file but that\'ll also remove all your orbiters, debris, etc.

Open your persistence file in a text editor (not office crap), they should be at the beginning.

CREW
{
	name = Jebediah Kerman
	brave = 0.5
	dumb = 0.5
	badS = True
	state = 3
	ToD = 14663.1065287665
}
CREW
{
	name = Bill Kerman
	brave = 0.5
	dumb = 0.8
	badS = False
	state = 3
	ToD = 14663.1065287665
}
CREW
{
	name = Bob Kerman
	brave = 0.3
	dumb = 0.1
	badS = False
	state = 3
	ToD = 14663.1065287665
}

Change their state to zero and they should be there again.

They\'re not always there (apparently it\'s a bug?). If they\'re in that file they would eventually be recycled unless there\'s another bug I haven\'t experienced.

That\'s why I said to delete if they don\'t show up after 50 or so flights.
First you should try to re-add them manually...
Hardly, if it\'s corrupted I\'ll just let it start over. It\'s an alpha so I don\'t expect it to keep all my stuff and deleting resets the bugged grounded parts anyway.
